name: Java
description: A popular object-oriented programming language used in enterprise applications, Android development, and backend services.

name: Spring Boot
description: A Java-based framework for building stand-alone, production-grade Spring applications with minimal configuration.

name: MySQL
description: An open-source relational database management system widely used for web and enterprise applications.

name: Docker
description: A platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in isolated containers for consistency across environments.

name: Vue.js
description: A progressive JavaScript framework used to build user interfaces and single-page applications.

name: JavaScript
description: A versatile scripting language primarily used for interactive web development on the client side.

name: Python
description: A high-level, interpreted language known for its simplicity and use in web, data science, automation, and AI.

name: Git
description: A distributed version control system for tracking changes in source code during software development.

name: HTML5
description: The standard markup language for creating web pages and web applications.

name: CSS3
description: The latest evolution of the Cascading Style Sheets language used for designing web layouts and appearance.
